topic.title: Networking and Network Services
topic.shortdesc: The configuration of the network is based on using the neutron based options supported by the OSP Code base and not relying on 3rd pary drivers. This reference configuration is based on the Neutron networking services using the OpenVswitch with the "vlan" option.
